issue.title: [Rust] Add trait bounds for T in Buffer/List
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-2528](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2528). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This is a first step in refactoring the rust API to make better use of traits and generics (and moving away from enums and macros).

This change introduces a trait for the primitive types that are allowed in Buffer and List and removes some use of macros.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2528?focusedCommentId=16459253) by Andy Grove (andygrove):*
Closing this Jira as it will be easier to just go with the full refactor, which we already have a Jira for.
